text: Nimen de zhu que shi an la, shi ta zai liu rinei chuangzaole tiandi, ranhou sheng shang baozuo [zhu], chuli wanshi. Chufei jing ta yunxu, fouze, jue meiyou renhe qiuqing zhe [neng xiang ta qiuqing]. Zhe jiushi an la——nimen de zhu, suoyi, nimen dang chongbai ta. Nandao nimen hai bu jieshou quangao ma?
